_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The path and practice for giving up the: Entering and remaining in the first absorption
Contemplating the phenomena as impermanent, suffering, diseased, a boil, a dart, misery, an affliction, alien, falling apart, empty, and not-self
Turning the mind away from those things and applying it to the deathless element
Rebirth spontaneously if not attaining the ending of defilements
Entering and remaining in the second absorption
Entering and remaining in the third absorption
Entering and remaining in the fourth absorption
Entering and remaining in the dimension of infinite space
Entering and remaining in the dimension of infinite consciousness
Entering and remaining in the dimension of nothingness
The diversity of faculties (a causal seq: Some mendicants are released in heart
